page.title: 03Recreation
page.content: Wroughton Sports Centre was opened in 1973 on the 7th of september by Sir Henry Langton.It consists of a swimming pool which has a diving board and its only open at certain nights, squash courts,badminton courts and a gymnasium hall.About 21300 people use the sports centre every year and they come from as far away as Malborough and lyneham.The most expensive facility to run is the swimming pool and it is also the most popular.There is a sports hall which is used for volley ball, indoor football, basketball, netball and badminton.You can hire the hall out for Â£6.00 an hour.
